page.title: 10THE DENTISTS
page.content: The surgery is next to the Vale Cinema,in Mirfield.To become a dentist Mr Holdsworth had to have A-levels in Sciences.He{trained at {Leeds Univeristy,taking 7 years to {qualify.}The hours he now works in the surgery:{Mon9-6,Tues 9-5 Weds 10-8, {Thurs9-6,Frids9-5,Sats 9-1.Plus upto {3hrs a night paper-work. He has to buy {all his machines,though they are tax {deductable but have to be paid for. Machines are reliable,they are mostly German and USA.Mr.Holdsworth's surgery {cost Â£18 000.The other 2 surgeries in {the practice cost the same.There is {also the cost of other machines. Perhaps the best machine infra_red filling setter.The teeth pulling instruments are like pliers.There are sterilizing liquids to clean tools.Fillings are made of a mixture of mercury and silver.
